name: Perdition (itch) (albersal7)
description:
Perdition is a first person horror game developed by Red Cube Studios in which you will need to investigate a series of disapperenaces and try to survive. You will be haunted by a strange presence and paranormal events will happen.  

As you go through the old house you will solve puzzles and try not to lose youreslf.

Perdition is available for windows.
